title: YAMC463 Handbook
content:
YAMC463 Official Handbook
IntroductionWelcome to YAMC463 Handbook, make sure you have already learnt all the things about the flight and phisical theory. To attend in YAMC463 sieries planes traning, the Commercial Pilot License and over 100 hours flight time are needed.
Pre-flight InspectionPre-flight Inspection is an inportant step in a flight. Here will give you the most important place that every pilot have to check.
Gear
Gear/ Hydraulic Strut
Hydraulic Shock Absorption
Tires
Break Pad
Gear pin

Belly
Ground energy suply panel
G

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment

A350 HandbookGeneral SpeakingIn this article, I will conclute all thethings with the AIRBUS-A350, and the skills with the flights. Some of the information comes from Internet.
Display SystemOverview
In this image we can know that there are 6 large screens in the cockpit, from the left to the right, they are: OIS, EFIS, the first officer has the same set but it is mirrored. The captain and the first officer share two same screes, one ECAM, the other is MFD. Let’s have a quick look below.
OISOIS is called Onboard Information System, it includes most of the flight information, such as airport charts, performance calculator, electric-flight-handbook, and the report of the plane.
EFISEFIS is called Electronic Flight Instrument System, this is the core to the modern flight system. EFIS is made with two panel: PFD and ND. We don’t introduce it here.
ECAMECAM is called 

All the signal is transformed via Avionics Network to the Onboard Computer.ahfioajhfof
